tasks.title: Complete Graph Collection - Add Missing Nodes
tasks.description: Add the remaining 70 graph nodes to reach the full 442 nodes collection
tasks.details: Currently we have 372/442 nodes loaded. Need to identify and add the missing 70 nodes to complete the graph collection. This involves analyzing the existing data structure and ensuring all nodes from the neurostalking domain are properly loaded.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all 442 nodes are loaded and accessible through the graph collection API

tasks.title: Complete Graph Collection - Add Missing Relations
tasks.description: Add the remaining 8 semantic relations to reach the full 259 relations
tasks.details: Currently we have 251/259 relations loaded. Need to identify and add the missing 8 relations to complete the semantic analysis capabilities. This involves ensuring all conceptual, causal, and practical relationships are properly defined.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all 259 relations are loaded and semantic analysis works correctly

tasks.title: Implement Graph Traversal System
tasks.description: Create graph traversal functionality for finding related concepts and building knowledge paths
tasks.details: Implement algorithms to traverse the graph collection and find related concepts, build knowledge paths, and discover connections between different nodes. This will enable more sophisticated querying and knowledge discovery.
tasks.testStrategy: Test traversal algorithms with various starting nodes and verify correct path discovery

tasks.title: Integrate Vector Database
tasks.description: Choose and integrate a vector database (Pinecone, Weaviate, or Qdrant) for semantic search
tasks.details: Research and select the best vector database for our use case, then integrate it with the existing SAG v2.0 system. This will enable semantic search capabilities across all processed content blocks.
tasks.testStrategy: Test vector database integration with sample data and verify search performance

tasks.title: Create Vector Embeddings for SAG Blocks
tasks.description: Generate vector embeddings for all existing SAG v2.0 blocks and implement embedding pipeline
tasks.details: Process all existing SAG v2.0 blocks to create vector embeddings using a suitable embedding model. Implement a pipeline for automatically generating embeddings for new content as it's processed.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify embeddings are generated correctly and stored in the vector database

tasks.title: Implement Semantic Search Engine
tasks.description: Build semantic search functionality with similarity scoring and ranking
tasks.details: Create a semantic search engine that can query the vector database, perform similarity searches, and rank results by relevance. This should integrate with the existing SAG v2.0 data structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search accuracy with various queries and verify ranking quality

tasks.title: Build Context Synthesis System
tasks.description: Implement system for synthesizing context from multiple SAG blocks
tasks.details: Create a system that can combine information from multiple SAG v2.0 blocks to provide comprehensive context for responses. This should intelligently select and merge relevant information from different sources.
tasks.testStrategy: Test context synthesis with various query types and verify coherence

tasks.title: Implement Response Personalization
tasks.description: Add user profile-based personalization for generated responses
tasks.details: Create a personalization system that adapts responses based on user preferences, interaction history, and profile data. This should enhance the relevance and usefulness of generated responses.
tasks.testStrategy: Test personalization with different user profiles and verify adaptation

tasks.title: Create Quality Validation System
tasks.description: Implement quality validation for generated responses to ensure high standards
tasks.details: Build a validation system that checks generated responses for quality, relevance, and coherence. This should prevent low-quality outputs and ensure consistent high standards.
tasks.testStrategy: Test validation system with various response types and verify quality filtering

tasks.title: Develop Web Dashboard
tasks.description: Create a web-based dashboard for system monitoring and management
tasks.details: Build a comprehensive web dashboard that provides system monitoring, statistics, configuration options, and content management capabilities. This should be user-friendly and responsive.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard functionality across different browsers and screen sizes

tasks.title: Build Content Upload Interface
tasks.description: Create interface for uploading and processing new YouTube content
tasks.details: Develop a user-friendly interface for uploading YouTube URLs, monitoring processing status, and managing content. This should integrate with the existing pipeline orchestrator.
tasks.testStrategy: Test upload process with various YouTube URLs and verify processing

tasks.title: Create Search Interface
tasks.description: Build search interface for testing vector and graph search capabilities
tasks.details: Develop a search interface that allows users to test both vector search and graph traversal capabilities. This should provide real-time results and visualization of search paths.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search interface with various query types and verify results

tasks.title: Develop REST API
tasks.description: Create comprehensive REST API for external application integration
tasks.details: Build a RESTful API that exposes all major system functionality for external applications. This should include authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive documentation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API endpoints with various clients and verify security measures

tasks.title: Add Multi-language Support
tasks.description: Implement support for English and Kazakh languages
tasks.details: Extend the system to support processing and searching content in English and Kazakh languages. This should include language detection, appropriate embedding models, and localized interfaces.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with content in different languages and verify accuracy

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Analytics
tasks.description: Add comprehensive analytics and reporting capabilities
tasks.details: Create analytics system that tracks usage patterns, search performance, content quality metrics, and system health. This should provide insights for optimization and monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test analytics with various usage scenarios and verify data accuracy

metadata.description: Complete the remaining development tasks for SAG v2.0 system
